newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian shares mark time with no big orders.
newsitem.headline: Russian shares mark time with no big orders.

text.p: Russian shares were little changed in quiet trade on Wednesday and dealers said there were no big orders in sight.
"There were individual deals in the shares which are always traded -- UES, Mosenergo, Rostelekom. On the whole prices are steady," said Firuz Mansurkhodzhayev of Creditanstalt-Grant.
On the Russian Trading System (RTS), UES edged down to $0.0830 from $0.0831 while Mosenergo rose to $1.010 from $0.994 and Rostelekom rose 10 cents to $2.68.
Shares of natural gas monopoly Gazprom, which said it was preparing to offer depositary receipts to foreign investors, edged up to 33.5 cents from 33.3.
The RTS index of 21 leading shares ticked up 0.60 percent to 185.00 on $9.0 million volume of reported trade.
